Antioch.Stabbing of Suzanne Bombardier: Suzanne A. "Suzie" Bombardier, (March 14, 1966 – June 22, 1980) was kidnapped, raped, and stabbed to death on June 22, 1980. On June 27, her body was found by a fisherman, floating in the San Joaquin River east of Antioch, California near its bridge, 60 miles (97 kilometres) east of San Francisco. On December 11, 2017, after extensive DNA analysis, 63-year-old Mitchell Lynn Bacom, a local registered sex offender, was arrested as the prime suspect.
